feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add step in team creation form for selecting event type and create a team event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15286
  • chore: improved lastused login method flow by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16511
  • fix: flakyness on booking questions tests by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16513
  • refactor: allow managed event tests parallel runs by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16113
  • feat: hashed link retrieval from event types v1 api by @JOSU9435 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16437
  • refactor: update AppProvidersAppDir to align more closely with AppProviders (used for Pages Router) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16496
  • fix: Left align instead of right aligned rating feedback in insights by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16521
  • chore: Add last batch of languages to translate with AI by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16520
  • chore: make generic function for separate or queries by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16522
  • fix: Broken preview deployments by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16523
  • chore: improve typing of runSeparateQueriesForOrStatements by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16525
  • chore: App-router-migration(/apps) fix metadata, extract components into /module and finish migration by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16354
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16524
  • chore: App router migration - (/more, /maintenance, /connect-and-join, /upgrade) finish migration by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16497
  • chore: updated cookie usage i18n by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16530
  • chore: get platform me from trpc instead of apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16515
  • chore: booker atom username / teams props enabled queries by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16514
  • feat: OOO webhook and zapier by @alannnc in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15434
  • fix: #16083. booking location editable by @emiliodeg in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16142
  • fix: Invalid options for Select and MultiSelect when both legacy and new options(i.e. with and without id are present) by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16509
  • fix: fixed the flaky e2e tests that failed the most times and refactor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16364
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16532
  • chore: App router migration - general settings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16312
  • chore: fix input DTOs for v2 calendar busy times endpoint by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16526
  • chore: Fix bundle error occurring in Next.js Bundle Analysis CI job by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16548
  • chore: Update and rename bug_report.yml to bug_report.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16556
  • perf: Modified Insights view to use UNION for user/team bookings by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16558
  • perf: use isTeamBooking filter in all of Insights by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16561
  • perf: Server-Side Data Fetching in App Router: SettingsLayout / AdminLayout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16537
  • chore: App router migration - /attributes, /privacy, /dsync, /license-key under /settings route group by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16406
  • chore: App router migration - settings/platform/**/*, settings/organizations/new and settings/organizations/[id]/* by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16334
  • fix: Skip COEP tests in embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16572
  • chore: Remove separate OR queries for Insights by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16568
  • fix: rescheduled by missing encoding by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16573
  • chore: Release v4.4.7 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16574

New Contributors

  • @JOSU9435 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16437
  • @emiliodeg made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16142

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.6...v4.4.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: to show updated values in eventTypes list by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16569
  • fix: prevent creating multiple platform orgs by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16564
  • fix: to allow paypal install on team when user already installed by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16553
  • perf: Insights - put teamId filter first by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16581
  • fix: booking response field's label is not translated by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16582
  • revert: booking rejection reason from booking success page by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16584
  • chore: App router migration (org/[orgSlug]/instant-meeting), add missing page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16448
  • perf: Server-Side Data Fetching in App Router: /availability by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16536
  • perf: Server-Side Data Fetching in App Router: /workflows by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16563
  • chore: App router migration - Fix /event-types/[type] page, move getServerSideProps to /lib for event-types pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16457
  • fix: wrong reschedule link for an org member for a booking on event outside the org by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15260
  • feat: V2 API endpoint create phone call by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16528
  • fix: Location Change to Organizer Default Conferencing App by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16379
  • fix: use meeting id to get transcripts by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16320
  • feat: instant meeting browser notifcations by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16480
  • perf: Include no shows in main status query by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16594
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16592
  • chore: v4.4.8 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16597

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.7...v4.4.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: API V1 slots add explicit orgSlug null fallback by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16593
  • fix: availability/[schedule] by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16598
  • feat: booking with phone number by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14461
  • chore: Remove passing optional prisma select prop to Repository classes by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16600
  • feat: update v2 calendar services logic to handle multiple calendars by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16478
  • fix(ally): changed unsemantic button by @mfranzke in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16588
  • fix: (managed-event-booking): slug conflict handling by @abhijeetsingh-22 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16540
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16603
  • fix: profile page flickering and refactor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16555
  • fix: use current user email by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16577
  • chore: Remove PR reviewed automation by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16615
  • feat: Implement Dub.co for conversion tracking by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16165
  • fix: prevent linking duplicate apple calendars by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16539
  • chore: v4.4.9 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16617

New Contributors

  • @mfranzke made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16588
  • @steven-tey made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16165

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.8...v4.4.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: App router migration - Create/Use EventRepository and Extract /team/**/* and /teams/* into /modules from /pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16453
  • fix: Show toast after copy referral link + change icon to "gift" by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16618
  • feat: overlay calendar for Booker atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16551
  • fix: async clipboard support in Safari by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16619
  • fix: remove duplicate teams layout by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16624
  • feat: replace team list view with org list view UI and fix team view user availability by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15344
  • chore: Add Prisma extension to block deleteMany/updateMany with undefined 'in' by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15721
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16616
  • feat: create loading state for copy referral link from dub.co by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16626
  • fix: make admin role unnecessary for future-opt-in API by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16628
  • chore: App-router-migration(/auth/verify) add missing metadata / page & extract components into /module by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16444
  • fix: get slot logic for v1 API by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16620
  • fix: hide platform tab in navigation when not subscribed by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16630
  • chore: rewrite imports of prisma enums to @calcom/prisma/enums by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16633
  • fix: use correct redirect url for google oauth when using overlay calendar by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16623
  • chore: added IS_EUROPE for signup by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16639
  • fix: prevent creating multiple platform orgs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16629
  • fix: managed event type is not deleted for the assigned user when the team is deleted by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16621
  • refactor: remove networkidle waiters by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16483
  • fix: Add new api-key CTA button is missing in settings/developer/api-keys by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16649
  • chore: v4.5.0 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16650

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.9...v4.5.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: StripeRepository -> StripeService and move from server/repository to server/service by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16632
  • fix: verify Code Dialog ui by @JOSU9435 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16655
  • fix: add logger to util to debug v1 API slot by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16657
  • fix: multiselect required check by @ashkkr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16653
  • fix: Update callback.ts to work with AU location by @curiousgeorgios in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16664
  • fix: fix org check on team slider by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16659
  • fix: overlay calendar view for Booker atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16642
  • chore: App router - add missing metadata for /[user] pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16516
  • chore: Update dclid â†’ dub_id by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16670
  • chore: App Router Migration, add metadata to getting-started, extract into /modules and add method to UserRepository by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16449
  • feat: org team app install by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15704
  • chore: expose metadata on platform booker atom by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16673
  • fix: make connect calendar atoms client side by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16677
  • fix: add optimistic UI for deleting member on org user table by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16662
  • feat: update vitest version v0.34 to V2.11 by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16676
  • chore: v4.5.1 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16690

New Contributors

  • @ashkkr made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16653
  • @curiousgeorgios made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16664

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.0...v4.5.1
